decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive red creatures and powerful burn spells. By playing low-cost, efficient creatures like Twinmaw Stormbrood and Razorkin Needlehead, combined with direct damage spells like Lightning Strike and Burst Lightning, the goal is to deal as much damage as possible early in the game. Cards like Sarkhan, Dragon Ascendant and Nova Hellkite provide additional late-game threats to close out the match. Soulstone Sanctuary can also help to keep the pressure on by buffing your creatures and providing card advantage.

The main idea of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of creatures with disruptive abilities and spells that can control the battlefield. By using cards like Spyglass Siren and Gloomlake Verge to disrupt the opponent's strategy, while also playing aggressive creatures like Floodpits Drowner and Deep-Cavern Bat, the deck aims to maintain board presence and push for early advantage. Additionally, with cards like Shoot the Sheriff and Phantom Interference for removal and protection, the deck can maintain momentum and dictate the pace of the game.

This deck focuses on fast and aggressive play, utilizing low-cost creatures and burn spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent. The main strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of creature attacks and direct damage spells, aiming to finish the game before the opponent has a chance to stabilize. Key cards like Burnout Bashtronaut and Nova Hellkite provide powerful threats, while cards like Burst Lightning and Lightning Strike offer efficient removal and reach. With a focus on speed and aggression, this deck aims to win the game as quickly as possible.

The main strategy of this deck is to quickly overwhelm your opponent with aggressive creatures and powerful spells, focusing on dealing damage as quickly as possible. By utilizing cards like Marauding Mako, Steamcore Scholar, and Vivi Ornitier, along with direct damage spells like Abrade and Torch the Tower, this deck aims to control the board and pressure the opponent into making suboptimal plays. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Proft's Eidetic Memory and Winternight Stories to refill your hand and maintain momentum. Overall, this deck aims to be fast-paced and relentless in its aggression.

This deck focuses on utilizing powerful creatures and spells in the Dimir colors to apply pressure to the opponent and control the board. By combining aggressive creatures like Cecil, Dark Knight and Floodpits Drowner with disruptive spells like Phantom Interference and Spyglass Siren, the deck aims to outpace the opponent and maintain board advantage. The inclusion of cards like Enduring Curiosity and Tishana's Tidebinder also provides card advantage and flexibility in different situations. Overall, the deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a mix of aggression and disruption.

This deck focuses on using aggressive creatures and disruptive spells to quickly control the board and push for victory. It combines the powerful card draw of Enduring Curiosity with the evasive threats of Spyglass Siren and Deep-Cavern Bat to apply constant pressure. Bitter Triumph and Floodpits Drowner provide removal options, while Cecil, Dark Knight and Tragic Trajectory offer additional ways to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck also includes some protection and trickery with cards like Soulstone Sanctuary and Faebloom Trick. With a mix of aggression and control, this Dimir Aggro deck aims to outpace and outmaneuver opponents for a swift win.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly overwhelm your opponent with aggressive creatures and spells, utilizing the UR colors for a mix of direct damage and card advantage. The deck aims to consistently have a presence on the board while disrupting the opponent's game plan with efficient removal spells. The focus is on tempo and early pressure to maintain control of the game and force the opponent to react to your threats. The deck also includes some card draw and selection to ensure a consistent flow of resources.

The main concept of this UR Aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. By using efficient creatures like Marauding Mako and Vivi Ornitier, along with powerful burn spells like Torch the Tower and Abrade, this deck aims to apply early pressure and finish off the opponent quickly. Additionally, cards like Winternight Stories and Fear of Missing Out provide card advantage and extra reach, while cards like Soulstone Sanctuary and Tersa Lightshatter provide resilience and disruption against opposing strategies.

The key concept of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and disruptive spells, utilizing the Dimir color combination. By combining efficient threats like Cecil, Dark Knight and Spyglass Siren with disruptive spells like Spell Pierce and Tragic Trajectory, the deck aims to maintain board control and pressure the opponent's life total. Additionally, cards like Enduring Curiosity and Soulstone Sanctuary provide card advantage and resilience. The deck's strategy is to outpace the opponent and disrupt their gameplan while building up a powerful board presence.

The main idea of this deck is to overwhelm opponents with aggressive creatures in the Simic colors of blue and green. The deck focuses on quickly building a board presence with efficient creatures like Sentinel of the Nameless City and Floodpits Drowner, supported by ramp cards like Llanowar Elves. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Royal Treatment and Spyglass Siren to control the opponent's board while maintaining the pressure. The inclusion of Surrak, Elusive Hunter and Genemorph Imago adds versatility and additional threats to the deck.

The deck focuses on aggressive, fast-paced gameplay with a mix of creatures and instant/sorcery spells to maintain tempo and pressure on the opponent. It aims to quickly build a board presence, disrupt the opponent's strategy, and apply consistent pressure to end the game swiftly. The cards included provide a balance of aggression, card advantage, and disruption to outpace the opponent and secure victory through overwhelming force and strategic plays.

The main concept of this deck is to control the board by utilizing a mix of removal, counter spells, and card draw. The deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy while setting up a win condition through card advantage and powerful spells. By utilizing a combination of control cards and powerful finishers like Ultima and Marang River Regent, the deck aims to outvalue the opponent and take control of the game. The mana base is built to support a mix of white, blue, and red spells, allowing for flexibility in casting a variety of powerful spells.

The deck focuses on creating a fast and aggressive playstyle using a combination of creatures with abilities that boost each other and disrupt opponents. It includes a mix of removal spells, powerful creatures with strong effects, and mana ramp cards to quickly establish board presence and overwhelm the opponent. The deck aims to maintain pressure and tempo throughout the game, utilizing the synergy between its cards to control the battlefield and secure a quick victory.

The deck focuses on maintaining control of the game through a combination of removal spells, counterspells, and card advantage. By using a mix of instant-speed and sorcery-speed spells, the deck can respond to threats and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck also includes ways to generate card advantage and mana efficiency to stay ahead in the game. The creature selection is minimal but impactful, with some providing utility or protection. The mana base is designed to support the deck's three-color requirements while also providing flexibility in casting spells.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures like Marauding Mako and Vivi Ornitier, while also disrupting their strategy with cards like Fear of Missing Out and Abrade. The deck also aims to control the board with cards like Quantum Riddler and Soulstone Sanctuary, and generate card advantage with Winternight Stories and Proft's Eidetic Memory. Overall, the deck focuses on putting pressure on the opponent early on and maintaining tempo throughout the game to secure a victory.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly build up a board presence and apply pressure on the opponent with aggressive creatures and powerful instant and sorcery spells. The deck focuses on utilizing cheap spells and abilities to control the board and deal damage efficiently. By efficiently managing resources and leveraging the synergies between cards, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent early in the game and secure a quick victory. The deck also includes a combination of card draw and mana fixing to ensure consistency in its aggressive strategy.
